## Compare Means Within Groups

This uses a paired t-test.

```{r}
# Example data
data <- data.frame(id = c(1:7),
           task1 = c(4, 1, 2, 3, 8, 4, 4),
           task2 = c(7, 13, 9, 7, 18, 8, 10))

data 
```


```{r}
#| eval: false
compare_means_within_groups(data$task1, data$task2)
```

```{bash}
#| eval: false

── Compare Means Within Groups ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  X.                result.estimate  
  mean.difference         -6.571429  
  t                           -5.18  
  p                           0.002  
  df                              6  
  ci_level                     0.95  
  lower_ci                    -9.68  
  upper_ci                    -3.46  

```
